name: mytello - cheap international calls
description: Make cheap international calls from your mobile. No contract, crystal clear sound and your first call is free. Top-up by PayPal/card, pay per minute and save up to 90% on every call. Your credit never expires.  *** Start your free call now ***  mytello connects over 150,000 people every month, cheaply. Theres no contract, just a low rate per minute to call any number in 227 countries. You dont need an internet connection to make a call and the person your calling doesnt need our app. Even better: your credit never expires, theres live-chat customer support, and we guarantee great call quality or your money back.  How mytello works:  1. Download the app 2. Enter a number and make your free call 3. Top-up and stay in touch for less!  mytello - the new way to make cheap international calls.  www.mytello.com facebook.com/mytellocom
